title: GARLIC HERB CRUSTED PORK TENDERLOIN
directions: Stir together garlic, sage, rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper and olive oil #1. Rub mixture over pork. Heat oven proof saute pan over medium-high heat. Add olive oil #Add pork and brown each side, about 4 minutes per side. Place pan with tenderloin in oven. Roast pork at 400F, turning occasionally, for about 20 minutes or until a thermometer inserted into thickest part of tenderloin reaches 145-150 degrees. Transfer pork to cutting board, cover with foil and let rest for 10 minutes to evenly distribute juices.
Why would I want to freeze this?
Stir together garlic, sage, rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper and olive oil #1. Rub mixture over pork. Divide pork into indicated number of freezer bags, label and freeze.

Heat oven proof saute pan over medium-high heat. Add olive oil #2. Add pork and brown each side, about 4 minutes per side. Place pan with tenderloin in oven. Roast pork at 400F, turning occasionally, for about 20 minutes or until a thermometer inserted into thickest part of tenderloin reaches 145-150 degrees. Transfer pork to cutting board, cover with foil and let rest for 10 minutes to evenly distribute juices.
